TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HMAC extends System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class HMAC Inherits KeyedHashAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示抽象類別，所有的雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 實作均須從這個類別衍生。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 可用來判斷透過不安全的通道傳送的訊息是否遭竄改的寄件者和收件者共用秘密金鑰。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 寄件者會計算原始資料的雜湊值，並將原始資料和 HMAC 傳送當成單一訊息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the HMAC as a single message. 收件者會重新計算已接收的訊息上的雜湊值，然後檢查計算的雜湊值相符的傳送的雜湊值。The receiver recomputes the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed hash value matches the transmitted hash value. HMAC 可以搭配任何反覆進行的密碼編譯雜湊函式，例如 MD5 或 SHA-1，共用秘密金鑰搭配使用。HMAC can be used with any iterative cryptographic hash function, such as MD5 or SHA-1, in combination with a secret shared key. HMAC 密碼編譯強度取決於基礎的雜湊函數的屬性。The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function. 資料或雜湊值的任何變更會導致不相符，因為知識祕密金鑰，才能變更訊息及重新產生正確的雜湊值。Any change to the data or the hash value results in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始和計算的雜湊值相符，驗證訊息。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: protected HMAC ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: HMAC();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

protected: property int BlockSizeValue { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用於雜湊值的區塊大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size to use in the hash value.

value.span: 要使用於雜湊值的區塊大小。

span.span: The block size to use in the hash value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 會使用雜湊函式會逐一查看的資料區塊中的基本壓縮函式雜湊資料。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) uses a hash function where data is hashed by iterating a basic compression function on blocks of data. 為這類區塊的位元組大小。 is the byte size of such a block. 其值為 64 個位元組。Its value is 64 bytes.

summary.span: 建立雜湊式訊息驗證碼 () 實作的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of an implementation of a Hash-based Message Authentication Code () .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create() cil managed
Public Shared Function Create () As HMAC
public: static System::Security::Cryptography::HMAC ^ Create();

summary.span: 建立雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 預設實作的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the default implementation of a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC).

returns.span: 除非已使用 [<cryptoClass> 項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/cryptography/cryptoclass-element.md)變更預設設定，否則為新的 SHA-1 執行個體。

span.span: A new SHA-1 instance, unless the default settings have been changed by using the [<cryptoClass> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/cryptography/cryptoclass-element.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個多載會使用 sha-1 HMAC 實作。By default, this overload uses the SHA-1 implementation of HMAC. 如果您想要指定不同的實作，使用多載，可讓您改為指定的演算法名稱。If you want to specify a different implementation, use the overload, which lets you specify an algorithm name, instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create (string algorithmName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC Create(string algorithmName) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (algorithmName As String) As HMAC
public: static System::Security::Cryptography::HMAC ^ Create(System::String ^ algorithmName);

param.name: algorithmName
param.span: 要使用的 HMAC 實作。

span.span: The HMAC implementation to use.

param.span: 下表顯示 algorithmName 參數的有效值及其對應的演算法。

span.span: The following table shows the valid values for the algorithmName parameter and the algorithms they map to.

summary.span: 建立雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 之指定實作的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of the specified implementation of a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC).

returns.span: 指定 HMAC 實作的新執行個體。

span.span: A new instance of the specified HMAC implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HMAC 支援雜湊演算法包括 MD5，sha-1、 sha-256，與 RIPEMD160 的數的字。HMAC supports a number of hash algorithms, including MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and RIPEMD160. 如需完整清單，請參閱支援的值`algorithmName`參數。For the full list, see the supported values for the `algorithmName` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 如果金鑰變更是合法的，則釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class when a key change is legitimate and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void HashCore (ReadOnlySpan<byte> source);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void HashCore(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> source) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub HashCore (source As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte))
protected: override void HashCore(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> source);
protected override void HashCore (byte[] rgb, int ib, int cb);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void HashCore(unsigned int8[] rgb, int32 ib, int32 cb) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub HashCore (rgb As Byte(), ib As Integer, cb As Integer)
protected: override void HashCore(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgb, int ib, int cb);

span.span: The input data.

param.name: ib
param.span: 位元組陣列中的座標，從此處開始使用資料。

span.span: The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.

param.name: cb
param.span: 陣列中要用作資料的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes in the array to use as data.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將寫入物件的資料轉遞到用來計算雜湊值的預設 雜湊演算法。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, routes data written to the object into the default hash algorithm for computing the hash value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式碼，不會呼叫這個方法。This method is not called by application code. 此抽象方法會執行雜湊計算。This abstract method performs the hash computation. 每次寫入至密碼編譯資料流物件會將資料傳遞到這個方法。Every write to the cryptographic stream object passes the data through this method. 對於每個資料區塊，這個方法會更新雜湊物件的狀態，以便在資料流結尾傳回正確的雜湊值。For each block of data, this method updates the state of the hash object so that a correct hash value is returned at the end of the data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override byte[] HashFinal ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] HashFinal() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function HashFinal () As Byte()
protected: override cli::array <System::Byte> ^ HashFinal();

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，當密碼編譯資料流物件處理最後的資料後，會對雜湊計算做最後處理。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, finalizes the hash computation after the last data is processed by the cryptographic stream object.

returns.span: 位元組陣列中計算出的雜湊碼。

span.span: The computed hash code in a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式碼，不會呼叫這個方法。This method is not called by application code. 這個方法會完成任何部分的計算，並傳回資料流的正確雜湊值。This method finalizes any partial computation and returns the correct hash value of the data stream.

Public Property HashName As String
public: property System::String ^ HashName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the hash algorithm to use for hashing.
The name of the hash algorithm.

exception.span: 無法變更目前的雜湊演算法。

span.span: The current hash algorithm cannot be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 可用來判斷透過不安全的通道傳送的訊息是否遭竄改的寄件者和收件者共用秘密金鑰。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 寄件者會計算原始資料的雜湊值，並將原始資料和 HMAC 傳送當成單一訊息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the HMAC as a single message. 收件者會重新計算已接收的訊息上的雜湊值，然後檢查計算的雜湊值相符的傳送的雜湊值。The receiver recomputes the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed hash value matches the transmitted hash value. HMAC 可以搭配任何反覆進行的密碼編譯雜湊函式，例如 MD5 或 SHA-1，共用秘密金鑰搭配使用。HMAC can be used with any iterative cryptographic hash function, such as MD5 or SHA-1, in combination with a secret shared key. HMAC 密碼編譯強度取決於基礎的雜湊函數的屬性。The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function. 資料或雜湊值的任何變更會導致不相符，因為知識祕密金鑰，才能變更訊息及重新產生正確的雜湊值。Any change to the data or the hash value will result in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始和計算的雜湊值相符，驗證訊息。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用於雜湊演算法的金鑰。

span.span: Gets or sets the key to use in the hash algorithm.

value.span: 要使用於雜湊演算法的金鑰。

span.span: The key to use in the hash algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是索引鍵的雜湊演算法的金鑰。This property is the key for the keyed hash algorithm. 雜湊式訊息驗證碼 (HMAC) 可用來判斷透過不安全的通道傳送的訊息是否遭竄改的寄件者和收件者共用秘密金鑰。A Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) can be used to determine whether a message sent over an insecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key. 寄件者會計算原始資料的雜湊值，並將原始資料和 HMAC 傳送當成單一訊息。The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and the HMAC as a single message. 收件者會重新計算已接收的訊息上的雜湊值，然後檢查計算的雜湊值相符的傳送的雜湊值。The receiver recomputes the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed hash value matches the transmitted hash value. HMAC 可以搭配任何反覆進行的密碼編譯雜湊函式，例如 MD5 或 SHA-1，共用秘密金鑰搭配使用。HMAC can be used with any iterative cryptographic hash function, such as MD5 or SHA-1, in combination with a secret shared key. HMAC 密碼編譯強度取決於基礎的雜湊函數的屬性。The cryptographic strength of HMAC depends on the properties of the underlying hash function. 資料或雜湊值的任何變更會導致不相符，因為知識祕密金鑰，才能變更訊息及重新產生正確的雜湊值。Any change to the data or the hash value results in a mismatch, because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value. 因此，如果原始和計算的雜湊值相符，驗證訊息。Therefore, if the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.

exception.span: 嘗試在雜湊開始後變更 屬性。

span.span: An attempt is made to change the property after hashing has begun.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool TryHashFinal (Span<byte> destination, out int bytesWritten);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool TryHashFinal(valuetype System.Span`1<unsigned int8> destination, [out] int32& bytesWritten) cil managed
